name: Funky Tour Battle
description:
Let’s discover a new way to enjoy gaming and music at the same time with Funky Tour Battle. This game is the easiest way to experience your musical ability and reaction while relaxing to energetic, upbeat music.

Download today and enjoy your energetic music matching battles!



HOW TO PLAY:
- Let yourself feel the music beat and tap the arrow when they perfectly match.
- Accurate timing is the key! Try to tap at the right moment and get a higher score to beat your opponents.



FEATURES:
- Endless entertainment with our diverse music library.
- Exciting world with numerous characters and guest characters.
- EASY and FUN to play, you can play this game anytime and anywhere for free.
